titles: An exhortation to peace and union a sermon preached at St. Lawrence-Jury, at the election of the Lord-Mayor of London, on the 29th of September, 1681 / by Gilbert Burnet ...
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: Wing formerly listed this work as B5877 (cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996) under title: A sermon preached at St. Lawrence-Jury at the election of the Lord-Mayor of London on the 29th of September, 1681.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and Huntington Library.
